name: PHP Programmers Group
tagline: The PHP Programmers Facebook group is a great place to ask your PHP related questions, and share cool php stuff
body:
### Welcome to PHp Programmers Group at GitHub

Some rules to clean the group from spam and make it more clear and useful for all.   

[Read the rules](https://www.facebook.com/groups/2322832835/permalink/10153904258917836/)

* Please report spam publications and publish important things about PHP if possible. The only way that this group will be useful for everyone is focusing on the language and its environment rather than trying to sell things or publish stuff that have nothing to do with the purpose of the group.

TO LEARN PHP:

w3schools.com, mysql.com, php.net, codeacademy.com, stackoverflow.com, google.com, etc..

The CodeAcademy offers great lessons for basic PHP:
http://www.codecademy.com/en/tracks/php

StackOverflow is a good website for many questions related to programming and the OS. Like a programming forum basically:
http://stackoverflow.com/

Google: answers to many questions here
http://google.com

PHP MANUAL: the best place to understand what really happens with your code: http://php.net/docs.php
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
